hero.title: Your Path to University Success
hero.subtitle: Elidu helps prospective students track admissions, monitor competitive rankings, and calculate budget admission probabilities with precision.

features.title: Why Choose Elidu?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to secure your university admission

tracking.title: Real-time Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor your position in competitive lists across multiple universities instantly

probability.title: Smart Probability Calculator
probability.description: AI-powered algorithms calculate your chances of budget admission with 95% accuracy

insights.title: Admission Insights
insights.description: Get detailed analytics and personalized recommendations for your application strategy

notifications.title: Instant Notifications
notifications.description: Never miss important updates about your application status and deadlines

compare.title: University Comparison

support.title: Expert Guidance
support.description: Access to admission consultants and peer support community

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands who secured their dream university spot

reviews.name: Anna Petrova
reviews.text: Elidu helped me track my ranking in real-time. I got into my dream program on budget!

reviews.name: Dmitri Volkov
reviews.text: The probability calculator was incredibly accurate. It gave me confidence in my choices.

reviews.name: Elena Smirnova
reviews.text: Thanks to Elidu's insights, I optimized my application strategy and got accepted.

cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Future?
cta.subtitle: Download Elidu today and take control of your university admission journey

footer.description: Elidu - Your intelligent companion for university admissions
footer.haveProject: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can work together to bring your ideas to life.
footer.name: Name

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, academic information, and university preferences.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including calculating admission probabilities, tracking competitive rankings, and sending you relevant notifications about your applications.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in certain limited circumstances, such as with your consent or to comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using Elidu, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

sections.title: Use License
sections.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of Elidu for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your device. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.title: Service Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue our service at any time without notice. We shall not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the service.
